Ok.content: This is a safer-for-work summary of key events and dialogue from "cheating is cuddleroom technique", itself a nsfw subthread within "project lawful and their oblivious boyfriend" occurring here; for the benefit of those readers who are here less for the sadomasochistic sex and more for the decision theory.
Ok.description: sfw tldr summary of a nsfw subthread in planecrash
Ok.subject: sfw tldr cheating is cuddleroom technique
